steps.name: Preheat and Prep
steps.instructions: Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F). Grease or line a cake pan with parchment paper.

steps.name: Mix Dry Ingredients
steps.instructions: In a large bowl, whisk together flour, cocoa powder, sugar, baking powder, and salt until well combined.

illustration.description: Dry ingredients in a mixing bowl

steps.name: Combine Wet Ingredients
steps.instructions: In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, and oil. Slowly pour the wet mixture into the dry mixture, stirring until just combined.

steps.name: Bake
steps.instructions: Pour the batter into the prepared pan and bake for 25–30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.

illustration.description: Cake batter in pan, ready to bake

steps.name: Cool and Serve
steps.instructions: Allow the cake to cool for 10 minutes in the pan before removing. Cool completely on a wire rack, then slice and serve. Frost if desired.

illustration.description: Fully baked chocolate cake cooling on a rack
